title: U.S. Military Charges Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl With Desertion
teaser: U.S. Army officials said Wednesday that Bergdahl's 2009 disappearance is considered a crime of desertion. Bergdahl was freed last May after being held captive by the Taliban for nearly five years.
